title: 'We want the world to see': Colombia protesters' demands grow in face of police brutality
content:
1. 'We want the world to see': Colombia protesters' demands grow in face of police brutality  USA TODAY
  2. Colombian protest leader Lucas Villa, who was shot eight times, dies  CNN
  3. Death toll from Colombia protests rises to 42, says human rights investigator  FRANCE 24 English
  4. Colombia Protests: Police Force, Built for War, Finds a New One  The New York Times
  5. Colombia protests continue in Cali as death toll climbs to 42 | AFP  AFP News Agency
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
